email_chain.subject: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Freight rate is $18/MT CIF. Laycan 1-5 December. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $15/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thanks for your response. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $20,000/day. The best I can do is $16/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed at $16/MT. Please send the recap.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Iron Ore
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Disch Port: Qingdao
- Freight Rate: $16/MT CIF
- Laycan: 1-5 December
- Demurrage: $20,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Iron Ore Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
James
